buginformation.summary: Strange behavior when I unwatch the last episode seen.
buginformation.description: When I unwatch the last episode seen in a show, the next episode SeriesGuide tells me to watch is not the good one. (SeriesGuide version 7.2-beta1) Steps to reproduce the bug: Add a show (I'll take Family Guy for example as it has a lot of episodes). Let's say I have seen the whole season 1 and the first episode of season 2, so I flag them all as seen. Next episode SeriesGuide tells me to watch is now 2x02, as expected. I accidentally flag episode 2x02 as watched. I then flag episode 2x02 as not watched yet in the seasons section. Go back to the main screen (when you see all your shows), SeriesGuide now tells me that the next episode of Family Guy I have to see is : 11x04 (???) To go back to normal, go to the seasons section of the show, find season 11 and, with the action button on the right, flag all the episodes as "watched none". You can reproduce once again that bug by flagging the next episode to see as seen and flag that episode as not watched yet. SeriesGuide will always tell you that, with my example, the next episode to see is 11x04. Why 11x04? I don't know... Looks like that bug happens to the shows with multiple seasons (I can reproduce this problem with Simpsons show, Futurama or The Wire). I don't know if I was very clear with that bug, I'll provide a video if needed.

buginformation.summary: Transparent tabs indicator is wrong color on dark theme
buginformation.description: Reported on Twitter

buginformation.summary: Add option to open added show from add dialog
buginformation.description: Suggested on G+

buginformation.summary: Expanded notification displays too many shows
buginformation.description: No description provided.

buginformation.summary: In single pane layout seasons do not update on overview changes
buginformation.description: No description provided.

buginformation.summary: Option menu items duplicate on orientation change
buginformation.description: Only when switching from multi-pane to single-pane layout.

buginformation.summary: Add show list menu options in search, maybe overview
buginformation.description: Reported on G+ and also planned internally. Currently show search result cards do not have any of the menu functionality as show cards in the Shows tab. Remedy that. Bonus: add in overview as well.

buginformation.summary: [Search] Filter suggestions when searching within show
buginformation.description: With how the suggestion system is currently designed in Android it is as far as I researched impossible to add per-activity filters like one can do by overriding onSearchRequested() for regular search. An alternative would be to turn off suggestions for search inside OverviewFragment, but guess what, AFAIK not possible. If anyone has viable solutions, I'm listening. E.g. you could create another SearchActivity which handles just searches from OverviewFragment. This way you could specify a different selection. However I still have only the user query as dynamic parameter, no?

buginformation.summary: Text cut off for 'Recommended' tab
buginformation.description: Seems to happen on non HD screen devices in portrait. See viewpagerindicator issues (not looking that up right now). Small devices affected.

buginformation.summary: [GoogleTV] Investigate channel tuning
buginformation.description: Tune into a channel from within SeriesGuide

buginformation.summary: Fix PendingIntent conflict between notifications and Widget
buginformation.description: Likely because I clear all pending intents when creating a notification widget PIs don't work anymore.

buginformation.summary: Little bug with infinite activity
buginformation.description: In the latest beta (v6beta1), go to the activity section in portrait mode with infinite activity unchecked (if it's already checked, uncheck it then go back to main menu, then go to activity section), then check this option and rotate your device in landscape mode. See? The layout keeps that "infinite activity mode" (with no separator) but you can't go further than 30 days. Same happens when you do the same from landscape mode to the portrait one.

buginformation.summary: Bring back search inside a show
buginformation.description: I kind of accidentially removed that by always forwarding the user to the search activity. Fix!

buginformation.summary: [GetGlue] Infinite loop between PrepareRequestTokenActivity and Browser
buginformation.description: Not that critical because you have to choose 'Allow' in the browser each time. You can always go back to the app. Investigate if this can really happen (I guess if no valid code is sent back, the task will just try to authenticate with GetGlue again, and again, you get the idea).

buginformation.summary: Investigate using Mediaportal API
buginformation.description: MPextended

buginformation.summary: [trakt-java] Investigate deserialization crash for user/friends
buginformation.description: It only happens with a watching entry. 10-30 03:49:57.048: E/AndroidRuntime(2023): Caused by: com.google.myjson.JsonParseException: The JsonDeserializer com.jakewharton.trakt.TraktApiService$5@44ebbfd8 failed to deserialize json object { "type":"episode","action":"checkin", "show":{ "title":"Fringe", "year":2008, "url":"http://trakt.tv/show/fringe", "imdb_id":"tt1119644","tvdb_id":"82066", "tvrage_id":"18388", "first_aired":1219734000, "country":"United States", "overview":"The series follows a Federal Bureau of Investigation "Fringe Division" team based in Boston. The team uses unorthodox "fringe" science and FBI investigative techniques to investigate a series of unexplained, often ghastly occurrences, some of which are related to mysteries surrounding a parallel universe.", "runtime":60, "network":"FOX", "air_day":"Friday", "air_time":"9:00pm", "certification":"TV-MA", "images":{"poster":"http://vicmackey.trakt.tv/images/posters/87.jpg","fanart":"http://vicmackey.trakt.tv/images/fanart/87.jpg","banner":"http://vicmackey.trakt.tv/images/banners/87.jpg"}}, "episode":{"season":1,"number":1,"title":"Pilot","overview":"When all the passengers on a plane die, FBI agent Olivia Dunham investigates the events and her partner almost dies. A desperate Olivia looks for help from Dr. Walter Bishop who has been institutionalized. Olivia, Dr. Bishop and his son Peter begin to discover what really happened on Flight 627 and begin to uncover a larger truth.","first_aired":1220943600,"url":"http://trakt.tv/show/fringe/season/1/episode/1","images":{"screen":"http://vicmackey.trakt.tv/images/episodes/87-1-1.jpg"}} } given the type class com.jakewharton.trakt.entities.WatchedMediaEntity

buginformation.summary: Switching seasons using ActionBar dropdown
buginformation.description: Hi, I'd love to have possibility to switch season on screen with list episodes. I was thinking that it would be nice to be able to use ActionBar.NAVIGATION_MODE_LIST to display list of seasons and quickly switch it. Reason of this request is that I watch "whose line is it anyway" in random order and I often check if I already watched that episode, and it's pain to click back and select another season. I could write pull request if you like that. Best Miko

buginformation.summary: SwipeRefreshLayout with RecyclerView causes drawing delays in Now tab
buginformation.description: When loading data any view inside SwipeRefreshLayout is not drawn (including the progress indicator). Only once data loading is complete drawing resumes. Removing the SwipeRefreshLayout completely fixes the issue. Investigating... Notes: https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=78191 nope, has no effect. seems related to how SRL draws, making test project for bug report. Not related to high CPU activity of one or more AsyncTaskLoader (tested using loaders which do Patter.compile() iterations before passing dummy data). Next: possible related to network activity

buginformation.summary: Next episode in Shows tab not updated on data changes
buginformation.description: Reported on G+ and via email It's likely we don't correctly trigger an update to the next episodes upon finishing a trakt sync or toggling watched state in the Upcoming/Recent tabs.

buginformation.summary: trakt sync not working on HTC phone
buginformation.description: Reported via email. [...] updating from trakt does not work on my AT&T HTC One. Updating, both auto and manual, works fine on my Nexus 7. On my HTC One, it's not that it never communicates w/ trakt, just that it never updates from trakt. I can Checkin to an episode, and mark an episode as watched, and both of those are successfully sent to trakt. I know those actions are successful both by the message that series guide shows AND by the fact that those actions do get updated on my Nexus 7 series guide. I've tried turning on and off the only update over wifi setting, it fails to update either way, so that's not related. Oh, one last piece of info about my HTC One is: Android: v4.3 HTC Sense: v5.0 Software number: 3.17.502.3 HTC SDK API level: 5.45

buginformation.summary: [API] Getting TV show release year (or release date)
buginformation.description: So there are some TV shows with the same name, e.g. The Flash 2014 and The Flash 1990. I think it's more convenient if we (extension devs) can get the release year or the release date of the show through com.battlelancer.seriesguide.api.Episode. Really hope you can implement it.

buginformation.summary: Do not notify about specials if user set to hide them
buginformation.description: No description provided.

buginformation.summary: Investigate trakt-java failure for empty shows
buginformation.description: Example profile: jllafond Results in exceptions when firing. Suspicion that this is caused by item {"title":null,"year":0,"imdb_id":null,"tvdb_id":null,"tvrage_id":null,"seasons":[{"season":1,"episodes":[1,2,3]}]}. Do some testing and look at the stack traces.

buginformation.summary: New update mechanism renders language selector useless
buginformation.description: Somehow override last edit times selection?

buginformation.summary: Up action in activity screen may exit app
buginformation.description: If the app was not previously launched and you access the activity screen via the list widget pressing the up button takes you back to the home screen. Looks like there is a bug with the support libraries up navigation support.

buginformation.summary: Some shows that are classified as ended don't say that in the show list
buginformation.description: Reported on G+

buginformation.summary: Skips get reset after trakt sync
buginformation.description: Reported on G+ Code seems fine, so is my library. Looks like a more intricate issue. Keep investigating.

buginformation.summary: In "Manage lists" items get unselected when scrolling out of view
buginformation.description: Reported via email. Feels like a view recycling bug.

buginformation.summary: Movies removed from trakt watchlist are re-added when syncing
buginformation.description: Removing a movie from the watchlist works as expected, it is also properly removed on trakt. However, on the next sync the movie is added to the watchlist (locally + trakt) again. Find out why!

buginformation.summary: Action Bar menu on main screen sometimes invisible
buginformation.description: Reappears once the Lists tab is selected. Another report: when returning from upcoming/recent via up to the home screen, it is also missing.

buginformation.summary: Overview does not refresh on provider changes
buginformation.description: E.g. if a new image url or a description is stored by the update task the content does not refresh. Make sure the update task notifies the correct/all relevant URIs.

buginformation.summary: Tablet show list network and time text does not wrap properly
buginformation.description: Because we use seperate TextViews instead of one and string-building the text it does not wrap. So change that and make sure the text properly wraps then!

buginformation.summary: [trakt] Auto-add shows only once
buginformation.description: If shows are multiple times inside the activity stream, they get added multiple times. Avoid that.

buginformation.summary: Content Providers Now Private By Default with API 17
buginformation.description: Which causes a lot of crashes like this: E/AndroidRuntime(26208): FATAL EXCEPTION: Binder_1

buginformation.summary: MultiChoice ListView not working in DialogFragment
buginformation.description: On Jelly Bean everything is fine, but boy does this not work in any other version. Why? See ListsDialogFragment.

buginformation.summary: [trakt] Watchlist tab in add screen
buginformation.description: Kind of makes sense, doesn't it?

buginformation.summary: Sort episodes by rating
buginformation.description: Actually a nice idea, maybe display the rating in the episode list as well.

buginformation.summary: Checkbox state of "Include unwatched flags" not stored
buginformation.description: In the trakt.tv Settings menu the state of the "Include unwatched flags" will not stored and reset from SharedPreferences unlike to all other preferences in the settings menu.

buginformation.summary: List names with some special chars are reset
buginformation.description: Quoting Tom: I tried to create a list name with a dash ("-"), as soon as I typed the dash, the already entered text would disappear. I found if I tried to first type some other symbol (say "="), it wouldn't display, but the text also didn't disappear, and now typing a dash also didn't cause the text to disappear. Fix the filter. I had a look at the filter for the text field, but couldn't find anything wrong so far. So far it resets to " " when entering a dash or an uptick. Allow dashes (check if the create id algorithm will not fail and still produce uniques).

buginformation.summary: Sync to/from trakt.tv canceled after rotating Device
buginformation.description: Hy Uwe, i have find an issue in the sync process. Steps to reproduce: Go to Settings -> Services -> trakt.tv hit "Sync to SeriesGuide" or "Sync to trakt.tv" rotate the device -> indeterminate ProgessBar disappear and Toast "Sync canceled" will shown regards, David

buginformation.summary: Empty view in add screen is a progress indicator.
buginformation.description: Fix that!

buginformation.summary: If sorted by next episode, ended shows should be sorted last
buginformation.description: User reported, not confirmed, yet When sorting shows by next episode, continuing and ended shows are mixed. Could you show ended shows after the continuing?

buginformation.summary: When adding a show, watched/collected episodes not always loaded
buginformation.description: Reported on G+ When adding a show, AddShowTask does not abort if loading watched/collected episodes fails. It probably shouldn't. Old train of though: sync will add watched/collected episodes. However, with the new v2 syncing algorithm this might not be true any longer all the time.

buginformation.summary: Ratings cache does not time out
buginformation.description: Currently up to the last 10 ratings are cached for episodes in TraktSummaryTask, using a LRU strategy to evict old entries. Meaning, even if some time has passed, the cached value will still be returned instead of refreshed. Potential solutions: Clear the cache after a timeout. Or: add timestamps to its entries and throw them away once over a certain threshold (minutes)

buginformation.summary: Shouts don't respect selected theme.
buginformation.description: Try using Android Dark theme. I believe this was by design, but look into it anyhow.

buginformation.summary: Automatically backup show database
buginformation.description: As a user pointed out the backup folder can then be synced via dropbox or anything else.

buginformation.summary: Notification settings not disabled if notifications are disabled
No error message if set watched/collected/etc. fails
buginformation.description: Reported on G+. Actually there should be. Guess parsing the failure response is somehow broken (trakt returns an array of what worked, failed, etc.). Handle responses in FlagTapedTask and throw an error toast if response not_found has elements.

buginformation.summary: Misleading error for check-in to non-existent (on trakt) episode
buginformation.description: Reported on G+ The API might return a 404 if it can't find an episode. Then it would be easy to intercept the RetrofitError and show a different error message. Also look at movies.

buginformation.summary: Some 4.1 tablets incorrectly using v17 (4.2) layouts
buginformation.description: Related to #340. Identified devices Prestigio 5580C PRO DUO, 8", Android 4.1 Nextboook 8 HD nx008hd8g, 8", Android 4.1.1 Sources https://plus.google.com/b/112462818579768957964/111426884411114266467/posts/NXKWNR4MgtQ https://plus.google.com/b/112462818579768957964/104891481008472832405/posts/WaM7SpwVcyV

buginformation.summary: [report] Add Fragment crashes if selected row is invisible?
buginformation.description: Exception class: java.lang.NullPointerException Source method: AdapterView.getPositionForView() "Tried to add a few popular shows immediately after another" java.lang.NullPointerException

buginformation.summary: Disconnect trakt, activity screen crashes if friends does not exist anymore
buginformation.description: No description provided.

buginformation.summary: Next episode in lists does not update live
buginformation.description: No description provided.

buginformation.summary: [TVDb] Shows not found by search
buginformation.description: The TVDb search API exposed to third-party applications is much worse than what is offered through their website. Shows are not found for partial title Shows are not found where only a non-English title exists, except if the search language is expressly changed to that language (e.g. SG 'Content language' setting) No autocomplete Examples: PSYCHO PASS C Money Control Hopefully the promised new API will solve these problems. Update: trakt is planning v2.0 for mid-2014 with potential international support and better search. Hopes are up!

buginformation.summary: Swipe refresh not working if list is empty
buginformation.description: Pulling down is not working if there are no items and the empty view is shown. Investigate android/support/v4/widget/SwipeRefreshLayout.java.

buginformation.summary: Show list with Unwatched filter is stale
buginformation.description: After changing the filters, it triggers an update. This should NOT happen, as this is handled completely by the loader framework and this code has remained untouched a while. Misinterpreted bug report. Show list cutoff for unwatched episodes is not refreshed on activity re-recreation as old loader is apparently re-used, ergo the cut-off is not updated to the current time, ergo shows with just released episodes do not show up. Original report

buginformation.summary: "Set (all older) watched" should only mark unwatched, released episodes
buginformation.description: Suggested on uservoice Mostly concerning submitting to trakt (database doesn't care) which will create new watches for already watched episodes. "Set all older watched" should only set unwatched/skipped "Set watched" for season should only set unwatched/skipped and released "Set watched" for show should only set unwatched/skipped and released Exclude specials when changing watched/collected state of show Side effects: breaks set watched season/show for episodes with no release date set increase in data sent to trakt (used mostly on seasons or shows that are completely unwatched, maybe check if number of episodes sent for season = total number of episodes in that season, then send only season) hardened against episodes on trakt not in SG (will only set watched what can be seen in SG)

buginformation.summary: Widget configuration change not reflected immediately
buginformation.description: When changing the widget type or any widget settings those changes only show when the widget updates again, not immediately after saving the changes. This is restricted to the items, the static content updates fine. Possible solutions: Have a look at the DashClock source code how it handles instant widget updates.

buginformation.summary: When searching, added shows can be added again
buginformation.description: Searching for show in "Add tab" that is in the show list. Should display that show is already in show list. Maybe also change trakt lists to display already added shows, but with an added indicator (e.g. show check mark instead of add button).

buginformation.summary: Image loading in add show uses too many AsyncTasks on scrolling fast
buginformation.description: Results in crashes on slower devices, because they can't keep up with finishing the tasks. Try to fail gracefully or Limit concurrent image downloader tasks, sequential execution or one task using a queue.

buginformation.summary: Work around crash when navigating away after checking in fails
buginformation.description: If the cancel dialog wants to appear, we fail. Apparently someones onSaveInstanceState got already called (we use the fragment manager of the share dialog, that's a starting point).

buginformation.summary: Shouts dialog is too small on Nexus 7
buginformation.description: "The Shouts box on old episodes appears too small to be useful on my Nexus 7." I guess always using a full screen activity should solve that problem.

buginformation.summary: Check-in Toast Doesn't Honor Season/Episode Display Format
buginformation.description: Shows 1x01 when I have it set to S01E01.

buginformation.summary: First list name 'Favorites' confusing
buginformation.description: Kind of did not change that, or did I want to rename favoriting to starring? Anyhow, fix it, so it is not confused with the existing 'Favorites' mechanism.

buginformation.summary: Collection indicator should not count unreleased episodes
buginformation.description: On the seasons tab the watched indicator on top is marked if i have watched all episodes yet aired, but the collection indicator is not marked if i also collected these episodes and there are more to be aired in the future. I think it unaired episodes should not be counted as uncollected.

buginformation.summary: Toolbar height in landscape mode
buginformation.description: The Toolbar height in landscape mode it too large. Just set layout_height to ?attr/actionBarSize instead of using minHeight. minHeight may be removed. Sorry for not sending PR, I am unable to build the app and check if everything is correct. But the fix is really easy so you will fix it in a few seconds.

buginformation.summary: [trakt] Option to add shows to watchlist
buginformation.description: Since you add the watchlist tab in the app, I think it would be great to add an option to put a show in our trakt watchlist, why not adding this option when we long press a show in the add screen?

buginformation.summary: Auto-Backup not created
buginformation.description: Check where SeriesGuide is trying to store the backup. However odly enough b4upgr backups do work...

buginformation.summary: [GetGlue] Helpful error message if no IMDb id
buginformation.description: Right now only the check box is unchecked which is veeeery unintuitive.

buginformation.summary: Movies without release dates are sorted first, not last.
buginformation.description: I think they should be sorted last since as far as I can tell they're all movies in the future.

buginformation.summary: Display estimate of watched time stat if there are many shows
buginformation.description: If the library has a lot (=hundreds) of shows, calculating the total watched time can be slow. Solutions: Display an initial estimate while still calculating the actual result in the background (hard, as we still need to query the episodes database to get the number of episodes per show for a useful estimate) Cut off at a fixed number of shows and say "more than x days..."

buginformation.summary: Full trakt sync does not reset collected or watched flags
buginformation.description: Full trakt sync does not re-set flags for shows not included in either trakt library or collection anymore.

buginformation.summary: Display name of item that is added to a list
buginformation.description: No description provided.

buginformation.summary: Time offset wizard with live examples
buginformation.description: No description provided.

buginformation.summary: Add more services
buginformation.description: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.netflix.mediaclient https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hulu.plus Or simpler: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cisi.activities searches many services Look if there are any public intents available which we could use, like e.g. for IMDb or the Play Store ap.

buginformation.summary: Navigating up from the Backup/Restore pane, post-backup, triggers a crash message
buginformation.description: In the current SeriesGuide Beta v5beta3, after executing a (JSON) Backup operation from the Settings, tapping the Up icon from the SeriesGuide action bar results in the following error message. This appears to occur whether the backup is still in progress, or has already completed.

buginformation.summary: [TVDb] Add new languages
buginformation.description: Notably Chinese (and Japanese?). Test if there would actually be a problem displaying those on older Android versions (hide them then).

buginformation.summary: Some 4.1 tablets incorrectly handle layout qualifiers
buginformation.description: First we had #346. Now with v11, which introduced GridView mirroring in RTL layouts (style in layout-ldrtl-v17 folder) those are again incorrectly used by some 4.1.x tablets. This leads me to believe that those tablets will use any folder that has the highest version qualifier (in this case v17, which is Android 4.2.x), ignoring if it is higher than their API level. Screenshot from user:

buginformation.summary: Launch via app icon may not resume where expected
buginformation.description: Launch into the app via the list widget (assuming from a notification is the same) Go to home screen. Launch app via launcher icon. Expected: app resumes where left off. Actual: app builds new stack on top of existing activities (e.g. shows show list, but back returns to previous task stack)

buginformation.summary: NPE for EventBus.getDefault() in AsyncTask.onPostExecute
buginformation.description: Getting reports for a weird NPE in https://github.com/UweTrottmann/SeriesGuide/blob/v12/SeriesGuide/src/main/java/com/battlelancer/seriesguide/util/MovieTools.java#L354. Guarded it for now, but still unsure what is going on (maybe GC snags it away?)

buginformation.summary: Movie ListView re-use image downloading problem.
buginformation.description: Notice "Yoga Hosers" and "Clerks III" (maybe it's only Kevin Smith movies that have this problem!). This only happens when scrolling fast and the image for the original movie to which the poster belongs is not in the memory cache.

buginformation.summary: Display episode title in check in comment to avoid confusion
buginformation.description: Display the episode title by default as check in comment to avoid people confusing trakt style check ins with GetGlue style check ins.

buginformation.summary: Add show through dialog, + button not disappearing
buginformation.description: No description provided.

buginformation.summary: More data sets for widget
buginformation.description: Hi! First of all thanks for your amazing work on this, I have gladly supported you by buying X version. However, there is what I am missing badly - I do use this app for tracking my progress in shows that has been already published. You have a data set showing next unseen episode of each show to be displayed on homepage. I am not sure what you call this data set in English version, it's third option in select on homepage. It would be great to choose this set to be displayed by widget! :) Thanks for your work! Tom

buginformation.summary: Intents that allow third party apps to integrate with SeriesGuide
buginformation.description: Following on from a post on the G+ comunity about intergration (not sure how to link back to it) I would love to be able to add an action item to my app that the user can press to view the show or episode in SeriesGuide. This would send either the seires id (view seires overview/give the user a change to add it), or an episode id (view the episode details/give the user a change to add the show), where the id's are the ones from TheTVDB.com. Also having an option to automatically mark something as viewed in SeriesGuide could also be useful. This could be implemented fairly easily using explicit intents where the other apps use something like intent.setComponent(new ComponentName("com.battlelancer.seriesguide","fullActivityName");

buginformation.summary: More ways to sort lists
buginformation.description: Reported on uservoice Sort by title next episode (show and episode items only, sort seasons last)

buginformation.summary: Shouts activity looks scary inverted on GB.
buginformation.description: No description provided.

buginformation.summary: Make library tab more visible (move it to the left)
buginformation.description: Discovery seems to be a little hard right now.

buginformation.summary: Trim guest star names
buginformation.description: Guest star names sometimes include additional trailing or leading spaces, make sure those are removed.

buginformation.summary: [trakt] Localize status toasts after trakt actions
buginformation.description: Currently SG just displays the message sent from trakt (e.g. "rated Friends 1x01" + " (trakt)"). However, this might not be necessary once trakt 2.0 launches (may include non-English support).

buginformation.summary: Cloud does not handle check-ins well
buginformation.description: Reported on G+ When connected to Cloud + trakt, the watch set on the trakt side is never downloaded. Hence manually need to set as watched. Which triggers a duplicate watch on trakt... Issue since trakt v2.

buginformation.summary: Incorrect relative time below Android 4.0
buginformation.description: SDK level 10 Hi,

buginformation.summary: [TVDb] Prevent episode (and season) duplicates
buginformation.description: If TVDb gets screwed up duplicate episodes and seasons can happen easily on updating because SeriesGuide doesn't delete old entries to preserve the watched status. Figure something out!

buginformation.summary: Can enable Restore button while Backup is running
buginformation.description: No description provided.

buginformation.summary: [Google TV] TVDb button in Upcoming unreachable via DPAD
buginformation.description: Same for the show link button.

buginformation.summary: Changing episode sorting not reflected in episode pager
buginformation.description: Especially a problem as we now highlight the selected episode in the list. It is done by position and changing the sorting screws this up greatly.

buginformation.summary: Show Absolute Number of Episode
buginformation.description: Hey, it would be great, if some Series could show the absolute Number of Episode. Like this: (List of Episodes for Season 2:) Episode 1 (12) << 12 would the 12th Episode of the whole Serial Best Regards

buginformation.summary: SecurityException: caller uid XXXX is different than the authenticator's uid
buginformation.description: See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3774282/securityexception-caller-uid-xxxx-is-different-than-the-authenticators-uid. The XML files declare them directly, however, in the SgAutheticator I get the package name. But that should always be the correct one, no?

buginformation.summary: Progress dialog sticks when not entering trakt credentials
buginformation.description: Checking in the first time, not saving trakt credentials: progress dialog stays around. Confirmed on: Google TV

buginformation.summary: Crash when selecting notification after deleting show
buginformation.description: For an unknown reason the cursor check here fails (EpisodeDetailsActivity), it seems to return something albeit the episode has been deleted. Debug!

buginformation.summary: Going back after forward to billing activity does not go back, but up.
buginformation.description: E.g. try to add a home screen shortcut without active X subscription. You are forwarded to the billing activity. If you go back, you are going up instead until the top setting screen (afterwards the app quits).

buginformation.summary: Past-midnight handling not appropriate for Japanese shows
buginformation.description: Reported in #460 and on Google+ Anime airing the hour past midnight is stored using the correct date in TheTVDB. Hence SG incorrectly adds a day to the release date. Japanese midnight shows with actual air dates: http://thetvdb.com/?tab=series&id=269872&lid=7 http://thetvdb.com/?tab=series&id=289884&lid=7 http://thetvdb.com/?tab=series&id=278626&lid=7 http://thetvdb.com/?tab=series&id=262954&lid=7 http://thetvdb.com/?tab=series&id=289907&lid=7 An U.S. midnight show with "wrong" air dates: https://forums.thetvdb.com/viewtopic.php?t=22791 http://thetvdb.com/?tab=series&id=292421&lid=7 Possible fixes: Apply past midnight fix for only US shows better, until we have examples for other countries Do NOT apply past midnight fix for Japanese shows

buginformation.summary: Hide hidden shows from new check in screen
buginformation.description: And look for other things I overlooked...

buginformation.summary: Collected flag in overview not representing actual state
buginformation.description: No description provided.

buginformation.summary: Infinite calendar omits episodes aired before 1.1.1970
buginformation.description: Episodes aired before the 1.1.1970 (start of the Unix timestamp) do not show up in the recent tab with the 'infinite calendar' option activated.

buginformation.summary: Crash due to foreground activity on SyncAdapter service
buginformation.description: Can't add new shows because add task does show toasts! 06-04 15:16:42.517: E/AndroidRuntime(15789): FATAL EXCEPTION: SyncAdapterThread-1

buginformation.summary: [trakt] Submit collected flags when uploading to trakt
buginformation.description: Get collected flags when adding a show. Sync with your trakt collection/library so you don't have to add shows manually. Mark seen of whole seasons, mark seen until submitted to trakt.

buginformation.summary: [api] Add absolute episode number property
buginformation.description: Suggested via email Send the absolute episode number to extensions.

buginformation.summary: FAB displayed on wrong tab
buginformation.description: It's possible for the FAB to be displayed on the "now" tab as a result of the FabAbsListViewScrollDetector getting confused about which Fragment is currently being shown. Personally, I don't like hiding the FAB, but I'm not sure how you'd like to handle it. An easy fix would be just to check to see if the grid has focus or not: if (!view.hasFocus() || totalItemCount == 0) {

buginformation.summary: Last notification time is not set when tapping a new episode notification
buginformation.description: Should result in the same behavior as if clearing a notification (delete intent).

buginformation.summary: Wrong error message when trying to delete show while updating
buginformation.description: Fix that!

buginformation.summary: [trakt] Going back from credentials dialog displays uncancelable progress
buginformation.description: Sigh Solution: Listen for the dialog getting canceled and try to dismiss the progress dialog fragment. Or don't put the progress dialog on the back stack (which I thought I already do...).

buginformation.summary: Autocorrect time for ALL US time zones
buginformation.description: If anyone wants to help, please install the Debugger.apk from the Downloads section and send in the displayed time zone code. sigh Android seems to have multiple time zone IDs per big time zone. GPS or phone network detection is out of question (no support for Google TV or devices which don't have GPS or cellular). Already supported: Eastern: America/Detroit America/New_York Central: America/Chicago Mountain: America/Denver Pacific: America/Phoenix (no summer time) America/Los_Angeles Full list of all Android time zone IDs: https://gist.github.com/1035596

buginformation.summary: Hide non-aired episodes from checkin screen
buginformation.description: Better this way, there might be some people in the future, but those should be the exception.
